alldb.table_sql: SELECT P.ID, P.DEVICE_NAME DEVICENAME, t9.name_ DEVICENAMENAME, P.PAYMENT_ID AS paymentid, P.PLAN_DATE AS plandate, P.PLAN_MONEY AS planmoney, P.PAY_OBJ AS payobj, P.PAY_CUST AS PAYCUST, CUST.CUST_NAME AS PAYCUSTNAME, P.FPNOTE, C.PROJ_ID AS contractid, P.FEE_TYPE AS feetype, D1.NAME_ AS feetypename, p.fund_type as fundtype, d4.name_ as fundtypename, P.PAY_TYPE AS paytype, D2.NAME_ AS paytypename, p.settle_method settlemethod, D3.NAME_ settlemethodname, p.is_prepay isprepay, CONFIG.FEE_TYPE_FIELD FIELDNAME FROM PROJ_FUND_FUND_PLAN P left join t_dicts_datas t9 on t9.id_=p.device_name LEFT JOIN PROJ_INFO C ON P.PROJ_ID = C.ID LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS D1 ON P.FEE_TYPE = D1.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS D2 ON P.PAY_TYPE = D2.ID_ LEFT JOIN T_DICTS_DATAS D3 ON P.Settle_Method = D3.ID_ LEFT JOIN FUND_FUND_PLAN_CONFIG CONFIG ON CONFIG.FEE_TYPE = P.FEE_TYPE LEFT JOIN CUST_INFO CUST ON CUST.ID = P.PAY_CUST left join t_dicts_datas d4 on d4.id_=p.fund_type WHERE P.PROJ_ID = '{proj_id}' /~feetypeout: and P.FEE_TYPE<>'{feetypeout}' ~/ /~notin: and P.FEE_TYPE not in (<<notin>>) ~/ /~feetypein: and P.FEE_TYPE='{feetypein}' ~/ <EXTRACTEND> order by to_number(paymentid) asc <EXTRACTEND>
